Hi
 
The separator is the following xaml is shifted about 1 inch to the right.
 
<Menu DockPanel.Dock="Top">
  <MenuItem Header="File">
    <MenuItem Header="One" />
    <Separator/>
    <MenuItem Header="Two" />
  </MenuItem>
/Menu>
WorkItem.Summary: Separator is shifted to the right (BureauBlack)
